item.description:
Our next evening meet up will be

LOCATION: Borders Books store in downtown boston (Take the T to downtown boston, www.mbta.com.)

TIME: from 6:00 to 8:00PM. Food and drinks available here.

NOTE: Some people have expressed interest in going out for dinner as a group afterwards so If you have any interest in that we may try to head over to Chinatown for a bite.

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.

We'd really like to make this meetup work for you. Please feel free to take our survey and share your thoughts: Click here to take Survey:

Please RSVP responsibly. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the cafe, I will have sign up!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Monday evening chinese/english language exchange group (winter section)
